title: MTGGoldfish

Magic the Gathering decks, reviews and product openings! The official channel for MTGGoldfish. Visit us at http://www.mtggoldfish.com.

Upload schedule for Major Series:

Monday: Budget Magic, MTGGoldfish Podcast

Wednesday: Against the Odds

Friday: Much Abrew About Nothing

videos.author: MTGGoldfish
videos.title: Izzet Sharks Love Discard  Much Abrew
videos.description:
How good is Aetherdrift's self-discard theme in Standard in a shark-heavy Izzet deck? Let's find out!

Today's video is brought to you by Card Kingdom. You can pick up some Magic: the Gathering cards (and help support the show) at https://www.cardkingdom.com/mtggoldfish

► Read more about this deck (full article): https://www.mtggoldfish.com/articles/much-abrew-izzet-sharks-standard
► View this deck with the latest prices: https://www.mtggoldfish.com/deck/6901208#paper

◼ Purchase this deck (paper): http://mtg.fish/i3Ea9
◼ Purchase this deck (Magic Online): http://mtg.fish/xm0Kt
